com.here.platform.location.core.geospatial.javadsl

Interface BoundingBoxAdapter<BB>

  • Type Parameters:
    BB - The type that can provide boundaries.

    public interface BoundingBoxAdapter<BB>
    Extracts north/south latitudes and east/west longitudes for some type.

    Its usage is optional when using types that implement BoundingBoxHolder.

    • Method Summary
